Details

topic singletons for the two kinds of automatic goodbyes (the kind of conversation ending that happens when we simply walk away from an actor we're in conversation with, or when we ignore the other actor for enough turns that the actor gets bored and ends the conversation of its own volition) **`endConvBoredom`**` :   object`
